text: John Joyce (born 1878) was an American track and field athlete who competed in the 1904 Summer Olympics. He competed in the 800 metres. He finished outside of the top six in what was a straight final. == See also == * United States at the 1904 Summer Olympics ==External links== * Category:1878 births Category:Year of death missing Category:American male middle-distance runners Category:Olympic track and field athletes of the United States Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1904 Summer Olympics
title: John J. Joyce
